name: ore D vice
description:
You have crashed on an alien planet.  Now you must try to survive!

  • Create devices that will aid you on you exploration.
  • Harvest plants, metal and ores.
  • Fight and kill the dangerous inhabitants of this strange world.
  • Upgrade your player.

Can you survive ore D vice?  Try it for FREE today!

Thanks for playing  :)

Life is Short = Be Creative
